cont.entity_a: Very balanced, clean, and clear sound with little coloration. Upper frequencies and voices are more detailed and sweeter compared to Audio Technica ATH-M50s. Incredible sound quality for the cost. Offers the lowest bass response without disappointment. Great for mixing, with detailed sound across the spectrum.
cont.entity_b: Excellent sound quality with a wide and expansive sound stage. Warm sound with clear mids and highs. Very detailed and articulate sound. Highly recommended for audiophiles seeking natural sound.

cont.entity_a: Capable of very deep bass, but bass boost may be needed for more bass than present in the recording. Offers the lowest bass response without disappointment. Not overly bass-heavy.
cont.entity_b: Bass is tight and controlled, but sub-bass may be lacking.

cont.entity_a: Foldable design improves portability. Coiled cable prevents tangling and accidental disconnection. Not active noise-canceling, but blocks out some ambient noise.
cont.entity_b: Open back design provides a natural and spacious sound. Not suitable for noisy environments due to open back design.

cont.entity_a: Very comfortable fit with a great adjustment system. Comfortable for long periods, though ear pads may wear out.
cont.entity_b: Very comfortable after breaking in. Comfortable for extended wear, but clamping force may be tight.

cont.entity_a: Durable build, lasting over many years with proper maintenance. Long-lasting with replaceable ear pads.
cont.entity_b: High build quality, though cable connection is a weak point. Durable with replaceable cables. Sound quality is consistent over years of use.

cont.entity_a: Cord is well made and sturdy, with a nice aluminized plug. Coiled cable prevents tangling and accidental disconnection. Coiled cord can be cumbersome, but provides flexibility.
cont.entity_b: High build quality, though cable connection is a weak point. Durable with replaceable cables.

cont.entity_a: Super value, especially for mixing and monitoring music.
Flat response suitable for studio use.
cont.entity_b: Great for mixing and mastering with phenomenal accuracy. Excellent for gaming and music with good imaging.
Requires a proper amplifier to drive effectively. Best paired with a quality DAC and amplifier for optimal performance.
